mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criminal Warrants, Justice of the Peace: Commonwealth vs Will Haden
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs Will Haden Offense: Assault Victim and Complainant: Ashby Edwards and Commonwealth vs Ashby Edwards Offence: Assault Victim and Complainant: Will Haden Will Haden confessed and agreed to pay Fine: $2.50 and Court cost: $2.00 Ashby Edwards was found guilty, Fine $2.50 and court cost $$2.00 Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 12.10.1887

Warrants (Law)
